12999.en: <start_lip_sync n01382 _normal m00001>You and I are the same.<stop_lip_animation n01382 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13000.en:
<start_lip_sync n01382 _normal m00001>Man or monster, either way it's kill or be
killed. That's the only way to stay alive,
isn't that right?<stop_lip_animation n01382 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13000.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01382 _normal m00001>「相手が魔物だろうが　人だろうが
　殺して殺して　殺しまくることでしか
　自分の命をつなぎとめられねえ。そうだろ？<stop_lip_animation n01382 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13000.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01382 _normal m00001>: 상대가 마물이든 사람이든
　그저 죽이고 죽이고 또 죽여야만
　네 목숨을 이어나갈 수 있지, 안 그러냐?<stop_lip_animation n01382 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13000.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01382 _normal m00001>不管对方是怪物还是人类，
只能不停地杀啊杀，
这样才能感受到自己还活着，对吧？<stop_lip_animation n01382 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13000.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01382 _normal m00001>不管對方是怪物還是人類，

13004.ja: <start_lip_sync n01386 _normal m00001>「ひっひっひっ……。<stop_lip_animation n01386 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13005.en:
<start_lip_sync n01386 _normal m00001>Do you understand?
You just saw a crazed warrior's ruin.<stop_lip_animation n01386 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13005.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01386 _normal m00001>「おわかりになりますか？

13005.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01386 _normal m00001>: 알아차리셨습니까?

13005.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01386 _normal m00001>明白了吗？
您现在堕落成为了狂战士。<stop_lip_animation n01386 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13005.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01386 _normal m00001>明白了嗎？
您現在墮落成為了
狂戰士。<stop_lip_animation n01386 CLOSE_MOUTH>

13007.en:
<start_lip_sync n01386 _normal m00001>I did not want you to not reduce yourself
to such a state.<stop_lip_animation n01386 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13007.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01386 _normal m00001>「わたくしめが望んだのは　あなたさまが

13007.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01386 _normal m00001>: 하지만 전 당신이

13007.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01386 _normal m00001>我并不期望您

13008.en:
<start_lip_sync n01386 _normal m00001>I'll turn back time a bit for you.

warrior ending.<stop_lip_animation n01386 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13008.ja:

　선택하시기 바랍니다.<stop_lip_animation n01386 CLOSE_MOUTH>
13008.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01386 _normal m00001>让我将时间稍稍倒退吧。
